title: Sugar beet production in the U.S. 2000 to 2019
summary: In general Production in thousand tons has fallen over the Year.
Production in thousand tons is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2015, roughly constant from 2015 to 2017, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2017 to 2019.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2018 and 2019.
The highest Production in thousand tons, of value 36920.0 was reached at Year 2016
The lowest Production in thousand tons, of value 28600.0 was reported at Year 2019
